title: Weekly Wrap: "New World Disorder."
description: It's Friday: Sam's shuffling through the street with NPR correspondents Ina Jaffe and Kirk Siegler this week. On the table: the President's travels and negotiations with NATO, Bett Kavanaugh, a call to a World Cup fan rooting for France, and a look at homelessness in Los Angeles and across the country.  Get tickets for our live show in LA on July 30 with John Cho and Aneesh Chaganty at nprpresents.org.

itunes:title: Weekly Wrap: "New World Disorder."
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: It's Friday: Sam talks NATO, Brett Kavanaugh, and America's homelessness crisis with NPR correspondents Ina Jaffe and Kirk Siegler.
